name: Ensnared
description:
________________________ 

Idea and Inspiration:-

I challenged myself to finish a game in just 15 days for a game jam specifically, the Metroidvania Month 15 Game Jam. The challenge was not just to submit a prototype of the game but a polished version of the game which was fully completed.  Music and assets infact everything in just 15 days....Hopefully, this game will be enjoyed by you and your friends.

You can buy the whole pack with all the 3 versions-Linux, macOS and Windows for 15$ as a gift or a friendship day gift(perfect for all ocassions) or just buy the individual game version which are each for 5$(perfect price)

________________________ 

Story-

You land in another universe and a friendly creature finds you. You two embark on a quest to find trans-universe transportation artifacts and return home. 

If you have Microsoft Edge use arrow keys, not WASD!

 ________________________ 

INSTRUCTIONS 

- Space to continue conversations 

- Click buttons to choose a choice 

- Use WASD to move OR arrow keys

 - Mouse to aim held objects

 - More (spoiler) instructions in-game 

Warning: File is large and laggy. Please close other tabs while playing! 

Ensnared is very prone to glitches from lag. 

________________________ 

NOTES 

- Mazduj gets easier the more you die; don't lose hope!

 - This project took a very long time to create. 

- All support is appreciated! 

- A lustrum is five years.

________________________ 

CREDITS 

- Pixel art created in Piskel by Metroid Games

- Text Generator (System) by Greatest20 

- Textbox System by Greatest20 

- Intro tune created by Metroid Games 

- Menu music (labeled Soft Ambient) created by Metroid Games and FinesseArt(my sister)

 - Background music from KeyGen Music, compiled by Bauxitus Names were not provided in the compilation. 

Some songs have been edited by Metroid Games

 - Ending music is Farewell Life by Arn Andersson

 - Friendship/pacifist side is inspired by Undertale! 

- Everything else created by Metroid Games 

________________________ 

UPDATES 8/18

1. Arrow key support added. 

________________________ 

Thanks for playing! If you enjoyed it, please love and fav it, and feel free to follow me for more projects! - Metroid Games
